title: Crime Alert 08.14.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.14.20
description:
Man pleads for cops to do something about criminals in his neighborhood. He's arrested for sex crimes. Man killed over parking outside his home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
